definition: head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
decoration/ornament/to decorate/to adorn/to hide/to conceal (a fault)/excuse (to hide a fault)/to play a role (in opera)/to impersonate

sentences.english: Avoid mini skirts, too much make up, and excessive jewelry.
sentences.chinese: 避免迷你裙，化太濃的妝和過多的首飾。

sentences.english: If you have no jewellery, can't you wear a flower instead.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有首飾的話，就不能戴朵花嗎？

sentences.english: Like any gemstone, take care not to subject your amethyst jewellery to sharp blows.
sentences.chinese: 就像任何寶石，注意不要受到衝擊大幅貴紫晶首飾。

sentences.english: In Moscow there is a shop selling exclusive jewellery and bijouterie.
sentences.chinese: 在莫斯科有一個商店賣專門的珠寶首飾。

sentences.english: Think studs and a pearl necklace, if you must wear jewelry.
sentences.chinese: 如果你必須戴首飾，就考慮耳釘和珍珠項鍊。

sentences.english: Women have to be modestly dressed,no jewelry, saved through childbearing.
sentences.chinese: 女人必須衣着簡樸，不能戴首飾，通過生育得到救贖。

sentences.english: Yeah, I like the beading, and you wouldn't need jewelry.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我喜歡那些綴飾，那樣你就不需要戴首飾了。

sentences.english: A long thin table against the front wall was covered with gorgeous jewelry.
sentences.chinese: 而靠牆的一條長桌上則擺滿了琳琅滿目的首飾。

sentences.english: The abandoned tea boxes can be transformed into very fine jewelry boxes.
sentences.chinese: 廢棄的茶葉盒可以變身精美的首飾盒。

sentences.english: Look for these sorts of explanations on the cards that accompany jewelry and head shop bric-a-brac.
sentences.chinese: 在首飾店裏的珠寶標牌上也能找到這類解釋。

sentences.english: You should lock the jewels in the safe.
sentences.chinese: 你應把珠寶首飾鎖起妥藏在保險箱內。

sentences.english: Religious jewellery such as rosary beads and bracelet makes for an interesting gift.
sentences.chinese: 念珠，手鐲等宗教首飾也是有趣的禮物。

sentences.english: Design your own clothes or jewelry.
sentences.chinese: 設計你自己的衣服和首飾。

sentences.english: Gently scratch your nail over the item to make sure that it won’t scratch or peel.
sentences.chinese: 輕輕地用指甲刮首飾，以確保不會有劃痕或者掉皮。

sentences.english: The burglars cleaned her out of all her jewellery.
sentences.chinese: 竊賊把她一切的首飾都偷走了。

definition: to arrange/to set out/to decorate/to display/decorative items
shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
